channel.title: How do you host 2 servs at the same time?
channel.description: Well, i dont really host but i ask this for a friend of mine, he is willing to host an allstar scape and figmentscape serv at the same time, he was allstar to be on port 43594 (def) and figment on 5555. He done everything and he still has this: Error starting up listener on port 43594. Port already in use? If somebody could help me and my friend, that would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: How do you host 2 servs at the same time?

item.description:
@TBHmoparownz wrote:

Thank you codex, i will try right away.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2008, 08:20:46 am[/size][hr]Thanks codex, it worked. I would Rep you but i dont see the button, sorry
